name: dyskinesia_symptom
title: Parkinson Dyskinesia Symptom Assessment
description: Assessment of Parkinson Dyskinesia (existence and numeric evaluation); Scoring with MDS-UPDRS 4.1

feature.name: periodStart
feature.title: Assessment date or start date of assessment period
feature.description: Assessment date (if periodEnd is not given) or start date of assessment period

feature.name: method
feature.title: Assessment method
feature.description: Code for the assessment method used (e.g. updrs4)

feature.name: isSymptomSeen
feature.title: Is dyskinesia seen
feature.description: Whether dyskinesia is seen during the given period

feature.name: symptomScore
feature.title: Dyskinesia score
feature.description: Dyskinesia score (e.g. calculated from MDS-UPDRS 4.1, percentage of waking day spent in diskynesia; Range: 0-4)
